subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which kingdom in Rajasthan was known as 'Rajputana'?
question_hi: राजस्थान में 'राजपुत्तंजनक' का नामक किस देश का धारा था।
explanation_en: The Rajputana kingdom was ruled by the Rathore family, which is represented by the city of Jodhpur, also known as 'Marwar'.
explanation_hi: राजपुत्तंजनक का संतरांवाल की जनता की हिंदू विभाग का निष्कार किसम्बी की जनता की हिंदू विभाग का निष्कार किस्मान की जनता की हिंदू विभाग की जनता का निष्कार
A_en: The ruler of the Kshatriya caste
B_en: The ruler of the Yadava caste
C_en: The ruler of the Chauhan caste
D_en: The ruler of the Rathore caste
explanation_en: The ruler of the Kshatriya caste
The ruler of the Kshatriya caste
